lrc.lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Thomas Bard/RJ Pasin/Tijn de Boer/Jozef van der Veen
[00:00.013] 作曲 : Thomas Bard/RJ Pasin/Tijn de Boer/Jozef van der Veen
[00:00.026](Oh baby, baby) Just stay here
[00:02.519]Never wanted you to disappear
[00:05.633]But don't you fall in love again with me
[00:08.581]'Cause we could f*ck it up so easily
[00:11.519]
[00:12.669]Can't really find the words to say, dear
[00:14.689]It's not that I don't love you, but I just need you to stay here
[00:18.495]Don't even know what to explain
[00:20.304]I can't afford to lose you but it seems I overpaid
[00:23.356]
[00:24.276]Overcompensating for the lack of all my feelings, I know
[00:30.072]Never meant to hurt you, girl, I love you but I think you should go
[00:34.133]Oh, oh
[00:35.105]
[00:35.132](Oh baby, baby) Just stay here
[00:37.738]Never wanted you to disappear
[00:40.938]But don't you fall in love again with me
[00:43.816]'Cause we could f*ck it up so easily
[00:46.600]
[00:46.743]Oh baby, baby
[00:47.760]Don't leave, don't lеave
[00:49.762]Just leave, babе, babe, babe
[00:52.675]Oh baby, baby
[00:53.659]Don't leave, don't leave
[00:55.856]Just leave, babe, babe, babe
[00:58.154]
[01:00.210]Talking this over is no use
[01:03.218]Not even sure where to go to
[01:05.849]It's gonna be lonely pretend that you hold me
[01:09.031]Know there's a home here for you
[01:11.225]
[01:11.230]Overcompensating for the lack of all my feelings, I know (Oh-oh)
[01:17.099]Never meant to hurt you, girl, I love you but I think I should go
[01:21.128]Oh, oh
[01:21.936]
[01:22.127](Oh baby, baby) Just stay here
[01:24.775]Never wanted you to disappear
[01:27.747]But don't you fall in love again with me
[01:30.746]'Cause we could f*ck it up so easily
[01:33.678]
[01:33.775]Oh baby, baby
[01:34.739]Don't leave, don't leave
[01:36.808]Just leave, babe, babe, babe
[01:39.627]Oh baby, baby
[01:40.610]Don't leave, don't leave
[01:42.685]Just leave, babe, babe, babe
[01:45.105]
[01:46.471]Overcompensating for the lack of all my feelings, I know
[01:52.268]Never meant to hurt you, girl, I love you but I think I should go
[01:56.136]Oh, oh
[01:57.214]
[01:57.342]Oh baby, baby, just stay here
[01:59.940]Never wanted you to disappear
[02:03.180]Can't deny the endless chemistry
[02:06.073]So don't you fall in love
[02:08.037]
[02:08.867](Oh baby, baby) Just stay here
[02:11.706]Never wanted you to disappear
[02:14.835]But don't you fall in love again with me
[02:17.674]'Cause we could f*ck it up so easily
[02:20.631]
[02:20.731]Oh baby, baby
[02:21.676]Don't leave, don't leave
[02:23.849]Just leave, babe, babe, babe
[02:26.562]Oh baby, baby
[02:27.565]Don't leave, don't leave
[02:29.721]Just leave, babe, babe, babe

tlyric.lyric:
[by:Mri_Zove]
[00:00.026]哦 宝贝 请留在我身边
[00:02.519]我从未想过让你消失
[00:05.633]但请别再爱上我
[00:08.581]因为我们很容易就会毁了这一切
[00:11.519]
[00:12.669]亲爱的 我找不到合适的词来表达自己
[00:14.689]我不是不爱你 只是你留在这里很重要
[00:18.495]我不知道该如何清楚地表达想法（啊）
[00:20.304]我无法忍受失去你 尽管我在这段感情里投入太多
[00:23.356]
[00:24.276]我知道 这是对我情感麻木的过度补偿
[00:30.072]从没想过要伤害你 我爱你 但我想你还是离开吧
[00:34.133]哦 哦
[00:35.105]
[00:35.132]亲爱的 就留在这里吧
[00:37.738]我从未想让你消失
[00:40.938]但请你不要再爱上我
[00:43.816]因为我们很容易就会毁了这一切
[00:46.600]
[00:46.743]哦 宝贝 宝贝
[00:47.760]请不要离开 别走
[00:49.762]就这样离开吧 亲爱的
[00:52.675]哦 宝贝 宝贝
[00:53.659]别走 别走
[00:55.856]离开吧 我的爱人
[00:58.154]
[01:00.210]多说无益
[01:03.218]我不知何去何从
[01:05.849]假装你还在这里的感觉很孤独
[01:09.031]要知道 这里永远有你的一席之地
[01:11.225]
[01:11.230]我知道 这是对我情感麻木的过度补偿
[01:17.099]我无意给你带来痛苦 我爱你 但我想我该离开了
[01:21.128]哦 哦
[01:21.936]
[01:22.127]哦 宝贝 请留在这里吧
[01:24.775]我从未想让你消失
[01:27.747]但请别再爱上我
[01:30.746]因为我们很容易就会毁了这一切
[01:33.678]
[01:33.775]哦 宝贝 宝贝
[01:34.739]请不要离开 别走
[01:36.808]就这样离开吧 亲爱的
[01:39.627]哦 宝贝 宝贝
[01:40.610]别走 别走
[01:42.685]离开吧 我的爱人
[01:45.105]
[01:46.471]我知道 这是对我情感麻木的过度补偿
[01:52.268]我从没想过要伤害你 我爱你 但我想我该走了
[01:56.136]哦 哦
[01:57.214]
[01:57.342]哦 宝贝 请留在我身边
[01:59.940]我从未想让你消失
[02:03.180]我们之间有无尽的化学反应
[02:06.073]但我们不要坠入爱河
[02:08.037]
[02:08.867]亲爱的 就留在这里吧
[02:11.706]我从未想让你消失
[02:14.835]但请你不要再爱上我
[02:17.674]因为我们很容易就会毁了这一切
[02:20.631]
[02:20.731]哦 宝贝 宝贝
[02:21.676]请不要离开 别走
[02:23.849]就这样离开吧 亲爱的
[02:26.562]哦 宝贝 宝贝
[02:27.565]别走 别走
[02:29.721]离开吧 我的爱人
